questions.question: Which member of the Triple Entente was the first to sign a peace deal with Germany?

choices.answer: Russia
Great Britain
France
Belgium

questions.question: How did the Russian surrender make things more difficult for the remaining member of the Entente?

choices.answer: The Germans had more soldiers available to fight the rest of the Entente
The Ottoman Empire became more ferocious of an enemy
The Austral Hungarian Navy was able to increase its size
Italy became a more strategic battleground

questions.question: What was the official reason given by the United States of America for enter the war?

choices.answer: The American's close ties to Canada at the time
The American's need to support the British Empire
The German Navy's sinking of the Lusitania
The assassination of President Teddy Roosevelt

questions.question: What did the British, French and Canadians do in response to the massive German assault of April 1918?

choices.answer: Pushed back equally hard in order to loose no ground
Retreated strategically until an proper offence could be planned
Surrendered important territory to the German Empire
Used chlorine gas

questions.question: Why did the Germans believe it so was important to start their assault as quickly as possible?

choices.answer: They needed to secure their victory before Christmas
They needed to secure their victory before the Russians could reorganise
They needed to secure their victory before fresh Canadian troops arrived
They needed to secure their victory before the Americans arrived

questions.question: What made the Entente counterattack so effective in July of 1918?

choices.answer: It was reinforced with new technology
It was reinforced by the American Army
It was reinforced by fresh Canadian troops
The German Army was tired and out of ammunition

questions.question: What is 11:00 AM - Nov 11, 1918 such an important date?

choices.answer: It was the day that the Armistice was signed?
It was the day that the Germans began their retreat
It was the day that the Ottoman Empire finally fell
It was the day that the Germans refused to sign the Treaty of Versailles

questions.question: What did the French government hope to achieve in the Treaty of Versailles?

choices.answer: A fair deal for both sides
To include the American conditions
To ensure that Canada was properly represented
A deal that would see Germany punished

questions.question: Freedom of the seas and the self determination of all nations were clauses of the Treaty of Versailles put forward by wh
The loss of the lands to Germany's east, the loss of the Rhineland and the loss of her colonies were _______ terms

choices.answer: Economic
Geographic
War Guilt
Reparation

questions.question: Forcing Germany to admit that they were responsible for the start of WW1

choices.answer: Geographic
War Guilt
Economic
Reparation

questions.question: Forcing Germany to pay for the war debts of Great Britain, France and Belgium

choices.answer: Reparation
War Guilt
Economic
Geographic

questions.question: Eliminating the German Air Force, reducing her Army and Navy were ______________ conditions of the Treaty

choices.answer: Military
Economic
Geographic
Reparation

Was sent from Germany to offer its surrender
Offered a secret truce to Belgium
Was a manufactured lie used by the USA to enter the war
merchant ships,would be attacked by the German Navy
Germany and the USA submarine naval battle

questions.question: Army Intelligence from this nation intercepted the Zimmerman Telegram

choices.answer: Canada
Great Britain
USA
France

questions.question: What two things did the Russian People want in March 1917

choices.answer: Land and Money
Victory and Land
Food and Peace
Peace and Quiet
